description: Customer email updates. Sign up to receive email updates to help you plan your travel in London

texts: Get weekly advance warning of weekend closures on TfL services by subscribing to our free weekend travel updates email.
Sign up for customer service email updates to find out about any changes to your regular journeys. We also provide traffic updates, Oyster news and information on accessibility across our network.
You can also receive our automated Journey Alert and Status Updates emails to avoid disruptions on your journeys.
